definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The creator God really is God.
sentences.chinese: 造物主上帝是真正的上帝。

sentences.english: The result of a demiurge's act of creation is a Progenitor, the prototype Promethean of a Lineage.
sentences.chinese: 造物主的作品就被称为先祖，也是该世系的原型。

sentences.english: If the human body's obscene, complain to the manufacturer, not to me.
sentences.chinese: 如果说人体是肮脏不堪的，向造物主去抱怨，别找我。

sentences.english: This is the prerogative and knowledge of the Creator Sons, and the Universe Mothers.
sentences.chinese: 这是造物主之子和宇宙之母的特权与知识。

sentences.english: I have felt like playing the abiotic God.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经想过要扮演一次造物主上帝。

sentences.english: I cannot bear it, and can no longer adore my Creator.
sentences.chinese: 我无法忍受了，我再也不会崇敬造物主了。

sentences.english: Nature has cunningly designed them to be irresistible.
sentences.chinese: 造物主巧妙地把他们设计得令人无法抗拒。

sentences.english: The Creator is a mighty and powerful essence of all-encompassing love.
sentences.chinese: 造物主是所有一切爱的伟大而有力量的本质。

sentences.english: It knows that even the least breath is a gesture of gratitude to the Creator.
sentences.chinese: 它知道甚至是最微弱的呼吸也是对造物主的一种感激。

sentences.english: But we do worship the Lord of creation, the Word of God who has become incarnate.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我们确实敬拜造物主，成为肉身之神的道。

sentences.english: Never thought I also just the creator of the pronto.
sentences.chinese: 却不曾想过自己亦只是造物主的弹指一挥间。

sentences.english: We can use our voice and sing to the Lord all of our life.
sentences.chinese: 我们能够一生扬声向造物主歌唱。

sentences.english: Love of the creature toward the Creator must include obedience or it is meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 受造者对造物主的爱必须包含顺服否则没有丝毫意义。

sentences.english: Those who reject the laws of the Maker and the words of His prophet are apostate .
sentences.chinese: 那些违背了造物主和他的先知的话语的人是异教徒。

sentences.english: Knowing how the Universe began and if a creator was necessary, or not.
sentences.chinese: 认知宇宙是如何开始的并且造物主是否是必须的。

sentences.english: Sounds solid: made by the mallet of Los Demiurgos.
sentences.chinese: 听上去蛮实，一定是巨匠造物主那把木槌的响声。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
favor/to give charity to sb out of pity
